00055                 IMAP_SESSION_BAD
00056         };

00095         UImapClient(bool bSocketIsIPv6 = false) : UTCPSocket(bSocketIsIPv6), buffer(U_CAPACITY)
00096                 {
00097                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UImapClient, "%b", bSocketIsIPv6)
00098 
00099                 state = NOT_AUTHENTICATED;
00100 #  ifdef HAVE_SSL
00101                 tls   = 0;
00102 #  endif
00103 
00104                 if (str_list == 0) str_allocate();
00105                 }

00130         // Universal Commands:
00131         //
00132         // CAPABILITY, NOOP, LOGOUT
00133         // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00134 
00138         int getCapabilities(UVector<UString>& vec);
00139 
00140         bool isSTLS(UVector<UString>& v) const { return (v.find(*USocket::str_starttls) != U_NOT_FOUND); }
00141 
00142         bool isCapability(UVector<UString>& vec, const UString& x) const  { return (vec.find(x) != U_NOT_FOUND); }

00148         bool noop() { return syncCommand("NOOP"); }

00154         bool logout();
00155 
00156         // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00157         // Authenticated State Commands:
00158         //
00159         // LIST, LSUB, STATUS, SELECT, EXAMINE,
00160         // CREATE, RENAME, DELETE, SUBSCRIBE, UNSUBSCRIBE, APPEND
00161         // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 
00185         typedef struct ListResponse { // (LIST | LSUB) command representation
00186                 UString name, hierarchyDelimiter;
00187                 bool marked, unmarked, noSelect, noInferiors, hasChildren, hasNoChildren;
00188         } ListResponse;
00189 
00190         bool list(const UString& ref, const UString& wild, UVector<ListResponse*>& vec, bool subscribedOnly = false);
00191 
00197         typedef struct StatusInfo { // STATUS command representation
00198                 long messageCount, recentCount, nextUID, uidValidity, unseenCount;
00199                 bool hasMessageCount, hasRecentCount, hasNextUID, hasUIDValidity, hasUnseenCount;
00200         } StatusInfo;
00201 
00202         enum StatusInfoType {
00203                 MESSAGE_COUNT = 1 << 0, // The number of messages in the mailbox
00204                 RECENT_COUNT  = 1 << 1, // The number of messages with the \Recent flag set
00205                 NEXT_UID      = 1 << 2, // The next unique identifier value of the mailbox
00206                 UID_VALIDITY  = 1 << 3, // The unique identifier validity value of the mailbox
00207                 UNSEEN        = 1 << 4  // The number of messages which do not have the \Seen flag set
00208         };
00209 
00210         // items is a logical OR of StatusInfoType item
00211 
00212         bool status(const UString& mailboxName, StatusInfo& retval,
00213                                         int items = MESSAGE_COUNT | RECENT_COUNT | NEXT_UID | UID_VALIDITY | UNSEEN);
00214 
00215         typedef struct MailboxInfo { // (SELECT | EXAMINE) command representation
00216                 StatusInfo status;
00217                 int flags, permanentFlags;
00218                 bool readWrite, flagsAvailable, permanentFlagsAvailable, readWriteAvailable;
00219         } MailboxInfo;
00220 
00221         // The flags that are applicable for a mailbox. Flags other than the system flags can also exist,
00222         // depending on server implementation. The PERMANENTFLAGS list can also include the special flag \*,
00223         // which indicates that it is possible to create new keywords by attempting to store those flags in the mailbox
00224 
00225         enum MailboxFlag {
00226                 SEEN      = 1 << 0,
00227                 ANSWERED  = 1 << 1,
00228                 FLAGGED   = 1 << 2,
00229                 DELETED   = 1 << 3,
00230                 DRAFT     = 1 << 4,
00231                 RECENT    = 1 << 5,
00232                 ASTERISK  = 1 << 6,
00233                 MDNSent   = 1 << 7,
00234                 Junk             = 1 << 8,
00235                 NonJunk  = 1 << 9,
00236                 Forwarded = 1 << 10
00237         };
00238 
00244         bool selectMailbox(const UString& name, MailboxInfo& ret);
00245 
00249         bool examineMailbox(const UString& name, MailboxInfo& ret);
00250 
00254         bool createMailbox(const UString& name);
00255 
00259         bool removeMailbox(const UString& name);
00260 
00264         bool renameMailbox(const UString& from, const UString& to);
00265 
00269         bool subscribeMailbox(const UString& name);
00270 
00274         bool unsubscribeMailbox(const UString& name);
00275 
00281         bool appendMessage(const UString& mailboxName, const UString& messageData, int flags = 0, const char* date = "");
00282 
00283         // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00284         // In the selected state, commands that manipulate messages in a mailbox are permitted.
00285         // the following commands are valid in the selected state:
00286         //
00287         // CHECK, CLOSE, EXPUNGE, SEARCH, FETCH, STORE, COPY, UID
00288         // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00289 
00293         bool check() { return (state == SELECTED ? syncCommand("CHECK") : false); }
00294 
00303         bool close() { return (state == SELECTED ? syncCommand("CLOSE") : false); }
00304 
00311         bool expunge(int* ret = 0);
00312 
00319         bool search(int* ret, const UString& spec, const char* charSet = "", bool usingUID = false);
00320 
00327         bool fetch(UVector<UString>& vec, int start, int end, const UString& spec, bool usingUID = false);
00328 
00336         enum FlagSetStyle {
00337                 SET    = 1 << 0,
00338                 ADD    = 1 << 1,
00339                 REMOVE = 1 << 2
00340         };
00341 
00342         bool setFlags(int start, int end, int style, int flags, bool usingUID = false);
00343 
00349         bool copy(int start, int end, const UString& destination, bool usingUID = false);
00350         // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00377         bool syncCommand(const char* format, ...) U_NO_EXPORT;

00379         UImapClient(const UImapClient&) : UTCPSocket(false) {}
